TITLE: Maps: Track hospital stress levels in your state
SUMMARY: Higher numbers of Covid patients limit the ability of hospitals to provide a full range of services

TITLE: Executives at 'fintechs' made hundreds of millions handing out PPP Covid cash, report says
SUMMARY: The report says smaller PPP loan applicants were disdained by one fintech, with staff writing, “delete them” and “Who f------ cares

TITLE: Former NBA star Jeremy Lin fined for comments about Covid quarantine while playing in China
SUMMARY: Lin, who plays for the Loong Lions Basketball Club, made “inappropriate remarks about quarantine hotel-related facilities” where the team stayed, the China Basketball Association announced

TITLE: Around 85% of recent Covid deaths were among people over 65. Why have so few gotten boosted?
SUMMARY: Experts maintain that the new bivalent booster shot offers important protection. But less than a third of the most vulnerable age group has gotten it

TITLE: China eases controls but gives no sign when ‘zero Covid’ will end
SUMMARY: Health experts and economists warn it will be mid-2023 and possibly 2024 before vaccination rates are high enough and hospitals are prepared to handle a possible rash of infections

TITLE: New coronavirus variants rendered the last remaining monoclonal antibody treatment useless
SUMMARY: The FDA rescinded its authorization of bebtelovimab this week, leaving immunocompromised patients with fewer Covid treatment options

TITLE: Hackers linked to Chinese government stole millions in Covid benefits, Secret Service says
SUMMARY: The theft of state unemployment funds is the first pandemic fraud tied to foreign, state-sponsored cybercriminals that the U.S. government has acknowledged publicly

TITLE: Myocarditis after Covid vaccine low among teens and young adults, large study finds
SUMMARY: The heart-related condition usually occurred within four days after the second dose of a Covid vaccine, the study found

TITLE: Twitter inundated with sexually explicit spam drowning out discussions of Chinese protests
SUMMARY: A flood of sexually explicit images followed the outbreak of protests, internet researchers say, in what appears to be a coordinated campaign

TITLE: New Zealand court rules against anti-vax parents of ill baby
SUMMARY: The parents refused blood transfusions for the baby unless it came from donors who were unvaccinated against Covid-19. Their legal battle has been embraced by anti-vaccine groups
